title: Powershap: A Power-full Shapley Feature Selection Method
abstract: Feature selection is a crucial step in developing robust and powerful machine learning models.

background.feature_selection_importance: Feature selection is important for reducing feature dimensionality, increasing model performance, enhancing computational efficiency, and improving model robustness.

methods.filter_methods: Filter methods are model-independent, fast, but have disadvantages such as ignoring inter-correlation between features and requiring thresholds.
methods.wrapper_methods: Wrapper methods consider feature interactions but are computationally expensive.
methods.shapley_values: SHAP values provide model-agnostic explanations and are popular despite some limitations.

previous_work.borutashap: It combines the Boruta algorithm using Shapley values, limited to tree-based models.
previous_work.shapicant: Inspired by permutation importance, adapted to use Shapley values for non-parameter estimation.
